items.name: Silicon Valley Immersive Lab
items.short_description: Dive into the future with cutting-edge exhibits on artificial intelligence, robotics, and virtual reality, offering hands-on experiences for all ages.

items.name: Guadalupe Riverfront Gardens
items.short_description: A beautifully revitalized urban oasis featuring native plant landscapes, public art installations, and serene walking paths along the Guadalupe River.
items.address: 300 W Hedding St, San José, CA 95110

items.name: The San José Market Collective
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor market hall showcasing an eclectic mix of local culinary talents, artisan crafts, and community events in a lively atmosphere.

items.name: Catalyst Contemporary Art Museum
items.short_description: Explore groundbreaking contemporary art with a focus on digital media and experimental installations from emerging and established artists.

items.name: Gravity Games Arcade & VR Zone
items.short_description: Unleash your competitive spirit in this state-of-the-art entertainment hub featuring classic and modern arcade games, cutting-edge VR experiences, and esports arenas.
items.address: 1550 N Berryessa Rd, San José, CA 95133

items.name: Innovation Hub Library & Maker Space
items.short_description: More than just books, this new community center offers 3D printing, coding workshops, co-working spaces, and resources for creative learning.

items.name: Coyote Creek Bouldering Park
items.short_description: An innovative outdoor recreation spot featuring custom-designed bouldering walls for all skill levels, nestled alongside the scenic Coyote Creek Trail.
items.address: 1770 E Capitol Expy, San José, CA 95121

items.name: The Echo Stage at Downtown West
items.short_description: An intimate and acoustically superb venue dedicated to live music, stand-up comedy, and diverse performing arts, bringing fresh talent to San José.
items.address: 10 N Autumn St, San José, CA 95110

items.name: Quantum Coffee Lab
items.short_description: Experience coffee reimagined in this sleek, science-inspired cafe where precision brewing techniques and unique flavor profiles create an unforgettable cup.

items.name: Adobe Heritage Park & Interpretive Center
items.short_description: Step back in time at this beautifully restored park, showcasing historic adobe buildings and interactive exhibits that tell the story of early Californian life.
items.address: 310 S Montgomery St, San José, CA 95110
